<http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#IceCream> Annotations: comment "A class to demonstrate mistakes made with setting a property domain. The property hasTopping has a domain of Pizza. This means that the reasoner can infer that all individuals using the hasTopping property must be of type Pizza. Because of the restriction on this class, all members of IceCream must use the hasTopping property, and therefore must also be members of Pizza. However, Pizza and IceCream are disjoint, so this causes an inconsistency. If they were not disjoint, IceCream would be inferred to be a subclass of Pizza."@en Class: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#IceCream> Annotations: label "Sorvete"@pt Class: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#InterestingPizza> Annotations: comment "Any pizza that has at least 3 toppings. A QCR would specify from which class the members in this relationship must be. eg has at least 3 toppings from PizzaTopping. This is currently not supported in OWL."@en Class: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#InterestingPizza> Annotations: label "PizzaInteressante"@pt Class: "An unclosed Pizza cannot be inferred to be either a VegetarianPizza or a NonVegetarianPizza, because it might have other toppings."^^xsd:string Class: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#UnclosedPizza> Annotations: label "PizzaAberta"@pt Class: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#ValuePartition> Annotations: comment "A ValuePartition is a pattern that describes a restricted set of classes from which a property can be associated. The parent class is used in restrictions, and the covering axiom means that only members of the subclasses may be used as values. The possible subclasses cannot be extended without updating the ValuePartition class."^^xsd:string Class: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#ValuePartition> Annotations: label "ValorDaParticao"@pt Class: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#VegetableTopping> Annotations: label "CoberturaDeVegetais"@pt Class: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#VegetarianPizza> Annotations: comment "Any pizza that does not have fish topping and does not have meat topping is a VegetarianPizza. Members of this class do not need to have any toppings at all."@en Class: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#VegetarianPizza> Annotations: label "PizzaVegetariana"@pt Class: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#VegetarianPizzaEquivalent1> Annotations: comment "Any pizza that only has vegetarian toppings or no toppings is a VegetarianPizzaEquiv1. Should be inferred to be equivalent to VegetarianPizzaEquiv2. Not equivalent to VegetarianPizza because PizzaTopping is not covering"@en Class: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#VegetarianPizzaEquivalent1> Annotations: label "PizzaVegetarianaEquivalente1"@pt Class: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#VegetarianPizzaEquivalent2> Annotations: comment "An alternative to VegetarianPizzaEquiv1 that does not require a definition of VegetarianTopping. Perhaps more difficult to maintain. Not equivalent to VegetarianPizza"@en Class: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#VegetarianPizzaEquivalent2> Annotations: label "PizzaVegetarianaEquivalente2"@pt Class: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#VegetarianTopping> Annotations: comment "An example of a covering axiom. VegetarianTopping is equivalent to the union of all toppings in the given axiom. VegetarianToppings can only be Cheese or Vegetable or....etc."@en Class: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#VegetarianTopping> Annotations: label "CoberturaVegetariana"@pt Class: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#Veneziana> Annotations: label "Veneziana"@pt ObjectProperty: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#hasIngredient> Annotations: comment "NB Transitive - the ingredients of ingredients are ingredients of the whole"@en ObjectProperty: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#hasSpiciness> Annotations: comment "A property created to be used with the ValuePartition - Spiciness."@en ObjectProperty: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#hasTopping> Annotations: comment "Note that hasTopping is inverse functional because isToppingOf is functional"@en ObjectProperty: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#isIngredientOf> Annotations: comment "The inverse property tree to hasIngredient - all subproperties and attributes of the properties should reflect those under hasIngredient."@en ObjectProperty: <http://www.co-ode.org/ontologies/pizza/pizza.owl#isToppingOf> Annotations: comment "Any given instance of topping should only be added to a single pizza (no cheap half-measures on our pizzas)"@en
